addtagstoresource.name: AddTagsToResource
addtagstoresource.description: Grants permission to add or overwrite one or more tags for a specified AWS resource

associateopsitemrelateditem.name: AssociateOpsItemRelatedItem
associateopsitemrelateditem.description: Grants permission to associate RelatedItem to an OpsItem

cancelcommand.name: CancelCommand
cancelcommand.description: Grants permission to cancel a specified Run Command command

cancelmaintenancewindowexecution.name: CancelMaintenanceWindowExecution
cancelmaintenancewindowexecution.description: Grants permission to cancel an in-progress maintenance window execution

createactivation.name: CreateActivation
createactivation.description: Grants permission to create an activation that is used to register on-premises servers and virtual machines (VMs) with Systems Manager

createassociation.name: CreateAssociation
createassociation.description: Grants permission to associate a specified Systems Manager document with specified instances or other targets

createassociationbatch.name: CreateAssociationBatch
createassociationbatch.description: Grants permission to combine entries for multiple CreateAssociation operations in a single command

createdocument.name: CreateDocument
createdocument.description: Grants permission to create a Systems Manager SSM document

createmaintenancewindow.name: CreateMaintenanceWindow

createopsitem.name: CreateOpsItem
createopsitem.description: Grants permission to create an OpsItem in OpsCenter

createopsmetadata.description: Grants permission to create an OpsMetadata object for an AWS resource

createpatchbaseline.name: CreatePatchBaseline
createpatchbaseline.description: Grants permission to create a patch baseline

createresourcedatasync.name: CreateResourceDataSync
createresourcedatasync.description: Grants permission to create a resource data sync configuration, which regularly collects inventory data from managed instances and updates the data in an Amazon S3 bucket

deleteactivation.name: DeleteActivation
deleteactivation.description: Grants permission to delete a specified activation for managed instances

deleteinventory.name: DeleteInventory

deletemaintenancewindow.name: DeleteMaintenanceWindow
deletemaintenancewindow.description: Grants permission to delete a specified maintenance window

deleteopsitem.name: DeleteOpsItem
deleteopsitem.description: Grants permission to delete an OpsItem

deleteopsmetadata.description: Grants permission to delete an OpsMetadata object

deleteparameter.name: DeleteParameter
deleteparameter.description: Grants permission to delete a specified SSM parameter

deletepatchbaseline.name: DeletePatchBaseline

deleteresourcedatasync.name: DeleteResourceDataSync
deleteresourcedatasync.description: Grants permission to delete a specified resource data sync

deleteresourcepolicy.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
deleteresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a Systems Manager resource policy

describeassociationexecutiontargets.description: Grants permission to view information about a specified association execution

describeassociationexecutions.description: Grants permission to view all executions for a specified association
